name: 3D Stunt Bike Real race Drifting
description:
3D Stunt Bike Drifting

This is the fastest and most action bike game you will play this year!

Bike Drifting is all about bike balance, skill and control as you guide your rider across the ramps, jumps, barrels and obstacles.

Bike Drifting game is Coin collecting game and unlock the another bike and track.make a different stunt with riding a bike.here first time we are providing different thing in our games.here is not a involve a traffic .so we are easily racing without traffic race.

Use your skills to drive Moto bike. picking up Coins and Power Ups on your high powered moto !
The control are easy and the incredible sound. Test our Moto racer game and enjoy.

this games provide three mode,easy ,hard and normal. you can select any one.

Key Features:

=> Enjoy different 3D Tracks as per mood
=> Easy and smooth handling
=> Stunning 3D Graphics
=> Different Moto with Different Stunt and get a free coin
=> Real motor sounds recorded from real bikes
